item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

[quote=“Mod Brandon12111, post:2, topic:347932”]That is correct IF the client is for other people not you. YOUR client has to be 127.0.0.1[/quote]You fail, Mr.

Why do you even show the GetWorld(int) method??

item.title: Need my server to be online
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

hey
i need my server to be online i have done all that guide said but it dont work.
i get into the server before i try to change the 127.0.0.1 ip to my own no-ip in the GUI- java in client files and change the ip in client.java in the source folder.
here is what i do in source files (client.java)

[code]public int GetWorld(int PlayerID) {
String Server = PlayerHandler.players[PlayerID].playerServer;

	if (Server.equals("dragonscapepvp.no-ip.biz") || Server.equals("localhost")) {
		return 1;
	} else if (Server.equals("")) {
		return 2;
	} else {
		println_debug("Invalid Server: " + Server);
		return 1;[/code]

and here is what i do in Client files (GUI.java)

System.out.println("Connecting"); //launchURL("PKPlanet"); Serverip = "dragonscapepvp.no-ip.biz"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

is this right?

Read full topic
